title: TCT Clip: The Hope MosulEye Kept Alive
description:
In honor the the fourth anniversary of the liberation of Mosul from ISIS, I'm posting a clip of my discussion with the extraordinary Omar Mohammed, founder of the Mosul Eye website. We talk about the hope and sanity he helped keep alive in his fellow citizens during the darkest days of ISIS occupation.


https://mosul-eye.org/
https://twitter.com/MosulEye
